content: Chapter 3 had the purple seals, but Chapter 4 has the Purple Talismans. Collecting all four and getting the final one at the Court of Illumination lets you have an early visit with the Supreme Inspector.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Secret_Bosses_in_Black_Myth_Wukong.md', within the main section titled 'Secret Bosses in Chapter 4', specifically from the subsection 'Supreme Inspector'.
The content is as follows:
Chapter 3 had the purple seals, but Chapter 4 has the Purple Talismans. Collecting all four and getting the final one at the Court of Illumination lets you have an early visit with the Supreme Inspector.
